::Zardus/Griplash/Starlight/Fenox/Recklessa::

Zardus looks over at Demolition, glancing at Fenox, Starlight, 
Griplash, and Recklessa as they approached. He looks down at his 
wrist comp as it reports a ship landing down in the jungle.

"Hmm.. Plans have changed. Demolition, go with Starlight, Griplash, 
and Reclessa to this new ship." (AJ's ship that landed) "Try to 
recruit any bots you see. Fenox, I'll need you to help with the 
underwater defence system."

Fenox nods as Starlight, Griplash, and Recklessa walk out of the Iron 
Fist.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He hadn't gotten an answer.
> "Lord Zardus? What do you need me to do?"
